title: Howdy, Folks!
text:
Iâ€™m an assistant professor of statistics in the School of Data Science and Analytics at Kennesaw State University. I received a PhD in Applied Statistics and Research Methods from the University of Northern Colorado in 2019.
I have research interests broadly in process control and improvement in the areas of education and public health. Check out my Google Scholar and Research Gate profiles for the most up-to-date list of my publications!
I teach several courses for KSU, including Data Visualization, Biostatistics, Applied Regression Analysis, and R Programming.
